entity-permission.name: blog-create
entity-permission.sql: SELECT acl.id FROM acl WHERE acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.user_id = :user_id

entity-permission.name: blog-delete
entity-permission.sql: SELECT acl.id FROM acl WHERE acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.user_id = :user_id

entity-permission.name: blog-create-post
entity-permission.sql: SELECT acl.id FROM acl WHERE acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.entity_id = :entity_id

entity-permission.name: blog-update-post
entity-permission.sql: SELECT acl.id FROM blog_post INNER JOIN acl ON acl.entity_id = blog_post.blog_id WHERE acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND blog_post.id = :entity_id
